# allowsParticipantsToInviteOthers

**Instance Property**

Default value is `NO`. If set, the system sharing UI will allow the user to choose whether added participants can invite others to the share. Shares with [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare/ParticipantRole/administrator] participants will be returned as read-only to devices running OS versions prior to this role being introduced. Administrator participants on these read-only shares will be returned as [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare/ParticipantRole/privateUser].

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsParticipantsToInviteOthers: Bool { get set }
```
title: allowsParticipantsToInviteOthers
